text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: First, let's go meet the horsegirl who we will be working with!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: The horsegirl you are in charge of is called a trainable horsegirl.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Please note you can't train a horsegirl until you have obtained her training version.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: In this gacha, you'll meet the horsegirl you will be training!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Well then, let's draw from the Pretty Derby gacha!
